entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 18 with temperature rising to minus 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind becoming south 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 18 with temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill minus 22 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning with a few flurries. Local blowing snow late in the afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 late in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the evening then clearing. Local blowing snow in the evening. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 after midnight. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023
